content: using just one hank of woolstok light and a modern and interesting cable this unisex hat is perfect for all seasons experience level * intermediate materials * woolstok light 100% fine highland wool 50g/218yds 1 hank * size 5 3 75mm 16 circular needle or size needed to obtain gauge * size 5 3 75mm double point needles or size needed to obtain gauge * stitch marker * tapestry needle * cable needle size * one finished measurements * hat circumference 18 * hat height 10½ color shown * golden meadow no 2308
